sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Button } from "reactstrap"; import firebase from "./../../config"; const Profile = () => { const [account, setAccount] = useState( JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("account") || "{}") ); const [role, setRole] = useState({ top: false, jungle: false, mid: false, ad: false, support: false }); useEffect(() => { const ref = firebase.database(); ref .ref("users") .orderByChild("username") .equalTo(account.username) .on("value", snapshot => { if (snapshot.val() !== null) { const [acc] = Object.values(snapshot.val()); setAccount(acc); } }); }, []); const updateProfile = async () => { const roles = Object.values(role).map((val, index) => val && Object.keys(role)[index]).filter(Boolean); console.log({...account, role: roles}) }; return ( Profile Form { console.log('123213') setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, ingame: value })) } } /> i === 'top')} onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, top: checked })) } /> i === 'jungle')} onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, jungle: checked })) } /> i === 'mid')} onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, mid: checked })) } /> i === 'ad')} onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, ad: checked })) } /> i === 'support')} onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => setRole(prev => ({ ...prev, support: checked })) } /> setAccount(prev => ({ ...prev, rank: value })) } > (Url) setAccount(prev => ({ ...prev, avatar: value })) } /> ); }; export default Profile;
